snippet: The political committee of French party The Republicans will meet on Monday to discuss the situation of its presidential candidate Francois Fillon, the party said in a statement on Saturday....

headline.main: Pakistan's Police Find Body Bearing Marks of IS Execution
headline.print_headline: Pakistan's Police Find Body Bearing Marks of IS Execution

lead_paragraph: The political committee of French party The Republicans will meet on Monday to discuss the situation of its presidential candidate Francois Fillon, the party said in a statement on Saturday.
